h3.a: AMI Days - Video Message from Mr. Williams to Seniors

div.p:
Nemo Vista Family,
During his daily press conference Governor Hutchinson announced today that school districts will remain closed to onsite instruction throughout the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year. This closure will include the Nemo Vista School District. However, we will continue the learning process by utilized Alternative Methods of Instruction (AMI) throughout the remainder of the school year.
